macro.name: w3-enhance-project-with-querymodifier
macro.process-xsl:
<xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:variable name="context"><xsl:value-of select="viv:value-of('querymodifier-project-context')" /></xsl:variable>
<xsl:variable name="request"> <call-function name="call-querymodifier-service" process=""> <with name="query-xml" process=""><xsl:copy-of select="viv:current-query()" /></with> <with name="context"><xsl:value-of select="$context" /></with>
<!-- For this sample we'll use the defaults for the function. You can add additional parameters to this function call to change the default behavior. Refer to function.call-querymodifier-service.xml for a parameter listing and information about each parameter. --> <!-- <with name="noisewords">customnoiseword1,customnoiseword2</with> --> </call-function> </xsl:variable>
<query> <!-- Uncomment this line for debugging --> <response><xsl:copy-of select="viv:process-xml($request)" /></response>
<!-- Uncomment this line for more debugging <log_nlq_query><xsl:copy-of select="viv:process-xml($request)/recommendations/context[@name=$context]/interpretations/interpretation/operator" /></log_nlq_query> -->
<!--Here check to see if there is a field named 'query' if so the query is not empty --> <xsl:variable name="notempty"><xsl:copy-of select="viv:process-xml($request)/recommendations/context[@name=$context]/interpretations/interpretation/operator[@logic='and']/term/@field='query'" /></xsl:variable>
<xsl:choose> <!--Here I test the variable for value, if it matches the regex tru+ it means it is not empty and I will submit the query manipulated by NLQ strategies --> <xsl:when test="viv:test($notempty, 'tru+', 'regex')"> <xsl:copy-of select="viv:process-xml($request)/recommendations/context[@name=$context]/interpretations/interpretation/operator" /> <!-- Uncomment this line for debugging <log when='1'><xsl:copy-of select="$notempty"/></log> --> </xsl:when>
<!-- If after being manipulated by NLQ the resulting query is empty, I will submit the original one--> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:copy-of select="viv:current-query()" /> <!-- Uncomment this line for debugging <log otherwise='1'><xsl:copy-of select="$notempty" /></log> --> </xsl:otherwise>
</xsl:choose>
</query>
</xsl:template>
